summary: This mod adds to the game, a set of Iron armor and Weapon, with the same values of Dragonplate Armor and Dragonbone Weapon
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim's most iconic armor is Iron Armor, but it's one of the weakest armor in the game.
This mod adds an armor of Iron armor and weapon, with the same attributes of Dragonplate and Dragonbone Weapon, that can only be forged with the skill Dragon armor.
The mod also allows to make the Longbow with the same power of the Dragonbone Bow.
author: reigabriel
